name: WKUserNotificationInterfaceController
desc: An interface controller object that manages a dynamic user interface for a local or remote notification.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Initializes and returns the interface controller using the specified remote notification data.

items.name: func didReceive(UNNotification)
items.desc: Delivers a notification object to your interface controller for processing.

items.name: var notificationActions: [UNNotificationAction]
items.desc: The actions associated with the current notification.

items.name: func performNotificationDefaultAction()
items.desc: Launches the watchOS app and performs the current notificationâ€™s default action.

items.name: func suggestionsForResponseToAction(withIdentifier: String, for: UNNotification, inputLanguage: String) -> [String]
items.desc: Returns an array of attributed strings representing the text suggestions to display during text input.

items.name: enum WKUserNotificationInterfaceType
items.desc: The type of notification interface to display.
